message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 8-8-1, translated into en
data:
Data availability:

Data on fatal injuries per 100,000 workers is available for 96 countries and territories. Data on injuries per 100,000 workers is available for 94 countries and territories.

Time series:

The submission covers data from 2000 to 2020.

Disaggregation:

This indicator should be disaggregated by both sex and migrant status.

Wherever possible, it would also be useful to have information disaggregated by economic activity and occupation.
